text: aur yadi ham use[1] chakha den apanee daya, duhkh ke pashchaat, jo use pahuncha ho, to avashy kah deta hai ki main to isake yogy hee tha aur main nahin samajhata ki pralay honee hai aur yadi main punah apane paalanahaar kee or gaya, to nishchay hee mere lie usake paas bhalaee hogee. to ham avashy avagat kar denge kaafiron ko unake karmon se tatha unhen avashy ghor yaatana chakhaayenge
